name: Keep it Afloat (Jan Marcano, Flor Campos, FERALBRO)
name_original: Keep it Afloat (Jan Marcano, Flor Campos, FERALBRO)
description:
A short co-operative game for the Ludum Dare Jam #46

Players control 2 blobs that are traveling in a crystal-energy powered ship to find a treasure some old pirate told them about.

In the way, some angry ancient harpies will try to steal your energy, stop them with the cannons.

If you lose all of your energy, the boat will stop and sink.

Hope you enjoy it!

CONTROLS:

Player 1 :

Move with A,D

Charge/shoot with spacebar

Aim cannon with W, S

Player 2:

Move with arrow keys

Charge/shoot with intro

Aim cannon with arrow keys
